title: 360: It’s Fun to Give Bad Advice!
itunes:title: 360: It’s Fun to Give Bad Advice!
description:
The Broad’s are here today to give the #broadsquad some intentionally BAD advice to their problems BUT it takes a swift turn (tune in)! They advise on topics like difficult in-laws, seeking male approval, walking away from friendships, wanting another child when your partner doesn’t, a best friend’s sketchy fiancé, “selfless love”, hating a partner’s fetish, and more! 

 

***Tune in Tuesday to hear The Broads chat with comedian Taylor Tomlinson! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM and use code CHATTYBROADS to save an additional 15% off your first order!

***AIR DOCTOR: Go to AIRDOCTORPRO.COM and use code CHATTY to receive a 35% discount on classic AirDoctor 3000 purifier!

***WONDERY’S “LIFE IS SHORT”: Listen to “Life is Short with Justin Long” on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen ad-free by joining Wondery Plus in the Wondery app!
